name: Shell Breaker
description:
Shellbreaker is a story based brick breaker adventure based on the jurney of Pampelmuse and her siblings towards Turtletopia the legendary turtle paradise.

  • Explore 40 unique levels in 4 different environments on the way to finding Turtletopia.
  • Meet Pampelmuse her siblings and other friendly or less friendly characters.
  • Unleash the unique powers of your turtles with plenty of power-ups for your balls and paddle
  • Engage in challenging boss fights.

How to Play (Web Version):

  •  Use the LEFT- and RIGHT-arrow keys to move the paddle
  •  The UP-arrow launches the hatchling (ball) and triggers special powers (depending on current power-up)
  •  At the final stages of a level the Starshooter can be utilized to finish the level quicker. It can be triggered by pressing on the blue star with the mouse or by pressing SPACE
